page.title: 13Recreation in Hartlepool
page.content: Leisure inb Hartlepool caters for people of all ages and all interests except in the field of theatre and cinema. {1. Can I see a play?} No, you could not see a play performed in a theatre by a professional company. However many local amateur groups put on plays, musical comedies and light operas in small theatres in the colleges and on stages in schools and the Town Hall. Some small professional touring companies bring productions to the town using the same stages as the amateur societies. {2. Can I see a film?} No, a cinema does not exist. However the film society meets fortnightly in the College of Art and shows a variety of films.
